title: Did Brett Cavanaugh decide that a raped immigrant should delay her abortion in order to " think of it maturely '?
subtitle: A widely shared idea obtained the basic facts about the October 2017 case, which includes the latest Supreme Court justice but the decorating of some details.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Judge Brett Cavanaugh once decided that a teenage immigrant who had been raped should take time to think hard before having an abortion.
